title: About
text:
Sandro has worked in the financial services and energy industries ever since 2013. He has honed his skills in data mining and wrangling, revenue modelling, portfolio management, financial risk analysis, risk and compliance assessments, market study and research, and budgetting and planning.


When not working on his data analytics projects, Sandro enjoys spending time reading fiction and non-fiction books, cooking indian food, going to the gym and spending time with his family.
